more_cobblemon_tweaks.config.option.pc_s: Adds a button to open/close a search bar.
more_cobblemon_tweaks.config.option.open: Should the PC remember and open to the last box you had open?
more_cobblemon_tweaks.config.option.pc_i: Adds a small widget to the pc menu showing the iv's of the previewed pokemon.
more_cobblemon_tweaks.config.option.cust: Allows the player to change PC box names.
Allows the player to change PC box wallpapers.
more_cobblemon_tweaks.config.option.enha: Adds lore describing various information about the pokemon contained in an egg.
more_cobblemon_tweaks.config.option.shin: If Enhanced Egg Lore is enabled, should it display if an egg is shiny?
more_cobblemon_tweaks.config.option.enha: Adds lore to berries that don't describe their behavior. (Tamato Berry, Pomeg Berry, etc)
Adds lore to various consumables without it. (Protein, Exp Candy, etc)
Adds lore to held items without any (Type Gems, Eject button, etc)
more_cobblemon_tweaks.pc_enhancements.cu: Click to rename the current box!
Click to change the wallpaper of the current box! (Hold Control to change all boxes)

Decreases the Pokémon's %s EV by 10 (if possible), while raising friendship.
Restores a selected move's PP when fed
Changes the stat effect of a Pokémon's Nature to %s.
Note: This does not change the Pokémon's actual Nature.
Increases the Pokémon's %s by 1 if possible.
Increases the Pokémon's %s EV by 10 if possible.
Increases the maximum PP of a selected move by 20% it's base PP. Can be stacked 3 times.
Increases the maximum PP of a selected move to 160% it's base PP.
Increases a Pokémon's experience by %s when used.
Increases the Pokémon's level by 1.
Increases the power of a %s type move by 30 percent.
Only activates once per battle.
Changes the ability of a Pokémon to it's alternative standard ability if possible.
Changes the ability of a Pokémon to it's hidden ability.
Causes the holder to switch out if hit by a damaging move. Activates only once per battle.
Halves the holder's weight to a minimum of 0.1kg.
Boosts the holders Defense and Sp. Defense by 50% if they are not fully evolved.
Raises the holder's Attack and Sp. Attack by two stages when hit by a super-effective move. Activates only once per battle.
Damages the holder by 1/8 of the holder's maximum HP at the end of each turn.
If a Pokémon with no held item hits the holder with a contact move, the Sticky Barb is transferred to the attacker.
